title: The Siren
description: Some love stories you never forgetShe tore herself from the man she adored, who transformed her, who possessed her...who would have destroyed her.Now she is adored by a man she must not have.Some books will change your worldShe thinks she knows what it means to be pushed to her limits. She's wrong.Be prepared...this is one of them
author: Tiffany Reisz
